# Draft:Newsboys : The King Of Christian Rock

----
Newsboys Is A Christian Rock Band Formed in Australia in 1985 They Have gone on 40 Years With Almost 2 dozen present and former members including Frontmen: John James, Peter Furler, Micheal Tait, and Adam Agee Although They Most Recently learned Tait1qwrfwf5h (talk) 21:17, 9 September 2025 (UTC) was living a double life after replacing him with Adam Agee they are coming out of the dark times Stronger Than before And Despite being rejected by their record label for reasons that were not their problem they are showing up everywhere it seems like they are in Europe Right Now They may not have the glory like they used to but more importantly they are giving God The Glory Please Support This Band
